remarks: Restricted quantitifer version of one direction of ~ 19.27 .  (The other direction holds when ` A ` is nonempty, see ~ r19.27zv .)  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.)
statement:
r19.27v $p |- ( ( A. x e. A ph /\ ps ) -> A. x e. A ( ph /\ ps ) ) $.
$d ps x $.
